baseline.description:
Specifies the baseline of the task.
When only one of 'start' or 'end' value is specified, or when 'start' and 'end' values are equal, the baseline is considered a milestone baseline.

borderRadius.description:
The border radius of the baseline. Accepts values allowed in CSS border-radius attribute.
The default value comes from the gantt's [task-defaults.baseline.border-radius]ojGantt#taskDefaults.baseline.borderRadius.
See the baseline attribute for usage examples.

end.description:
The end time of the baseline.
Optional if baseline is a milestone.
Either start or end has to be defined in order for the baseline to properly render.
See [Date and Time Formats]ojGantt#formats-section for more details on the required string formats.
See the baseline attribute for usage examples.

height.description:
The height of the baseline in pixels.
The default value comes from the gantt's [task-defaults.baseline.height]ojGantt#taskDefaults.baseline.height.
See the baseline attribute for usage examples.

start.description:
The start time of the baseline.
Optional if baseline is a milestone.
Either start or end has to be defined in order for the baseline to properly render.
See [Date and Time Formats]ojGantt#formats-section for more details on the required string formats.
See the baseline attribute for usage examples.

svgClassName.description:
A space delimited list of CSS style classes defining the style of the baseline.
The default value comes from the gantt's [task-defaults.baseline.svg-class-name]ojGantt#taskDefaults.baseline.svgClassName.
See the baseline attribute for usage examples.

svgStyle.description:
The CSS style defining the style of the baseline.
The default value comes from the gantt's [task-defaults.baseline.svg-style]ojGantt#taskDefaults.baseline.svgStyle.
See the baseline attribute for usage examples.

borderRadius.description:
The border radius of the task. Accepts values allowed in CSS border-radius attribute.
The default value comes from the gantt's [task-defaults.border-radius]ojGantt#taskDefaults.borderRadius.

end.description:
The end time of this task. Optional if task is a single date event like Milestone.
Either start or end has to be defined in order for the task to properly render.
See [Date and Time Formats]ojGantt#formats-section for more details on the required string formats.

height.description:
The height of the task in pixels.
Since row heights can also be set via the gantt's [row-defaults.height]ojGantt#rowDefaults.height attribute,
applications typically should make sure that their task heights are less than the row height.
The default value comes from the gantt's [task-defaults.height]ojGantt#taskDefaults.height.

label.description: The label associated with the task.

labelPosition.description: The position of the label relative to the task, or a priority order of label positions for the component to automatically choose from.

labelStyle.description: The CSS style defining the style of the label. Only CSS style applicable to SVG elements can be used.

progress.description: Specifies the progress of the task. This property is ignored if the task is a milestone.

borderRadius.description:
The border radius of the progress bar. Accepts values allowed in CSS border-radius attribute.
The default value comes from the gantt's [task-defaults.progress.border-radius]ojGantt#taskDefaults.progress.borderRadius.
See the progress attribute for usage examples.

height.description:
Specifies the height of the progress bar in pixels (e.g. '50px') or percent of the associated task bar (e.g. '15%').
The default value comes from the gantt's [task-defaults.progress.height]ojGantt#taskDefaults.progress.height.
See the progress attribute for usage examples.

svgClassName.description:
A space delimited list of CSS style classes to apply to the progress bar. Note that only CSS style applicable to SVG elements can be used.
The default value comes from the gantt's [task-defaults.progress.svg-class-name]ojGantt#taskDefaults.progress.svgClassName.
See the progress attribute for usage examples.

svgStyle.description:
The CSS inline style to apply to the progress bar. Only CSS style applicable to SVG elements can be used.
The default value comes from the gantt's [task-defaults.progress.svg-style]ojGantt#taskDefaults.progress.svgStyle.
See the progress attribute for usage examples.

value.description:
The value of the progress between 0 and 1 inclusive. If not specified or invalid, no progress will be shown.
See the progress attribute for usage examples.

rowId.description: The id for the row the task belongs to.

shortDesc.description: The description of the task. This is used for accessibility and for customizing the tooltip text.

start.description:
The start time of this task. Optional if task is a single date event like Milestone.
Either start or end has to be defined in order for the task to properly render.
See [Date and Time Formats]ojGantt#formats-section for more details on the required string formats.

svgClassName.description:
A space delimited list of CSS style classes defining the style of the task.
The default value comes from the gantt's [task-defaults.svg-class-name]ojGantt#taskDefaults.svgClassName.

svgStyle.description: The CSS style defining the style of the task. The default value comes from the gantt's [task-defaults.svg-style]ojGantt#taskDefaults.svgStyle.

type.description:
Defines the task type to be rendered.
If "milestone", and if 'start' and 'end' values are specified and unequal, the 'start' value is used to evaluate position.
If "auto", the type is inferred from the data: If 'start' and 'end' values are specified and unequal, "normal" type is assumed. Otherwise, "milestone" type is assumed.

The default value comes from the gantt's [task-defaults.type]ojGantt#taskDefaults.type.
